site_name: Trinity Church Of England Primary School
description: Variation of Condition 11: Drainage relating to amendments to the approved drainage strategy for Bishop Justus School (Phases 4 and 5) approved under planning permission 18/02121/RECON for Variation of Condition 2: Approved documents and Condition 3: Construction Management Plan of permission granted under reference 15/05392/FULL1 for Extensions and alterations to Trinity Church of England Primary School (to accommodate 2 additional forms of entry) and construction of all-weather pitch and MUGA, vehicular access from Church Lane, access road, additional car and cycle parking and associated works. Extensions to Bishop Justus Church of England School (to accommodate 2 additional forms of entry), additional car and cycle parking for additional windows, roof vents, retention of existing stair enclosure and change in shape of curtain walling and the discharge of condition 3: Construction Management Plan of 15/05392 for Phase 6 (relating to Bishop Justus).
